milkshake.title: Milkshake
milkshake.tagline: The cows gallop freely in a frenetic battle for FAME and GLORY
milkshake.details: This game was created during a 48-hour game jam challenge where participants had to create a game from scratch based on a theme.
cardDescription: Use an INCREDIBLY IRRESPONSIBLE AMOUNT OF WEAPONS to defeat your bovine rivals and gain followers. One shot won't be enough to send you to the slaughterhouse, try hard. THIS IS MILKSHAKE
Solve ancient puzzles and challenge the assassins from the Order of Silence to claim the knowledge these tombs guard.
gameDescription: Use an INCREDIBLY IRRESPONSIBLE AMOUNT OF WEAPONS to defeat your bovine rivals and gain followers. One shot won't be enough to send you to the slaughterhouse, try hard. THIS IS MILKSHAKE
Solve ancient puzzles and challenge the assassins from the Order of Silence to claim the knowledge these tombs guard.

Milkshake is a fast-paced multiplayer shooter where you play as cows armed with ridiculous weapons. The game combines chaotic gameplay with humor and over-the-top action. Players compete to gain followers by performing spectacular kills and stunts, all while avoiding being sent to the slaughterhouse themselves.
features: Frantic multiplayer battles with up to 8 players
